Commands.Bluff: Grants Power of Black Magic for 2 turns and raises BRV based on Attack.  Turns to Bluff+ after use.  Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 2 turns.  Power of Black Magic raises Attack.
Commands.Bluff+: Grants Power of Black Magic for 3 turns and raises BRV based on Attack.  Turns to Bluff++ after use.  Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 3 turns.
Commands.Bluff++: Grants Power of Black Magic for 4 turns and raises BRV based on Attack.  Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 4 turns.
Commands.Mysidia's Ice Crystal: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Wisdom of Black Magic for 2 turns.  Turns to Mysidia's Ice Crystal+ after use.  Turns HP Attack to Dualcast for 2 turns.  Wisdom of Black Magic raises Max BRV.
Commands.Mysidia's Ice Crystal+: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Wisdom of Black Magic for 3 turns.  Turns to Mysidia's Ice Crystal++ after use.  Turns HP Attack to Dualcast for 3 turns.
Commands.Mysidia's Ice Crystal++: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Wisdom of Black Magic for 4 turns.  Turns HP Attack to Dualcast for 4 turns.
Commands.Blizzard Boost: 2-HIT Ice magic BRV+HP attack  Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Stardust: 2-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  Inflicts Ice Resistance Down for 4 turns.  Follows up with a 5-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  Moderately increases BRV damage to a single target.   HP damage is equally divided among all targets.  Extends the duration of Power of Black Magic and Wisdom of Black Magic by 3 turns.  Also extends the duration of BRV Attack+ and Dualcast by 3 turns.

Passives.Bluff Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Bluff.
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Mysidia's Ice Crystal Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Mysidia's Ice Crystal.
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Bluff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Bluff.
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV Damage when attacking an enemy not targeting self.
Passives.Mysidia's Ice Crystal Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Mysidia's Ice Crystal.
Passives.Black Mage's Talent: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with BRV Attack+ and Dualcast.
Passives.Power of BM Attack Up: Moderately raises Attack while Power of Black Magic is active.
Passives.Bluff Extend: Tremendously raises the potency of the BRV Gain based on Attack Power.Extends Power of Black Magic by 6 turns.Triggers HP attack after use.Extends the duration of BRV Attack+ by 6 turns.BRV Attack+ changes from 1-HIT to 2-HIT and its potency is moderately raised.
Passives.Wisdom of BM Boost&Speed Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Speed while Wisdom of Black Magic is active.
Passives.Mysidia's Ice Crystal Extend: Extends Wisdom of Black Magic by 6 turns.Triggers HP attack after use.Extends the duration of Dualcast (HP Attack+) by 6 turns.Changes Mysidia's Ice Crystal /+/++/Great from 1-HIT to 2-HIT.In addition to the HP attack on the main target, it will deal 40/60/80/100% damage to other targets depending on the state of the ability.Moderately raises Dualcast's potency.
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Blizzard Boost Extend: When using  Blizzard Boost :- Slightly improves  Max BRV Up  effect

Weapons.Faerie Rod CP: 35: Increases the potency of all variations of Mysidia's Ice Crystal and that of Wisdom of Black Magic.Extends the duration of Dualcast and increases its potency.Increases its max uses by 1 and turns Mysidia's Ice Crystal into an HP attack for its last use.
Weapons.Stardust Rod CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Stardust.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Blizzard Boost  use +1Duration of  Blizzard Boost  effects +1 turn
Weapons.Mysidia's Rod CP: 15: Raises the BRV gain and lowers the Action Delay of Bluff, Bluff+ and Bluff++.Increases the potency of Power of Black Magic and extends its duration.Extends the duration of BRV Attack+, increases its potency and lowers its Action Delay.
